name: worth-the-wait-trader-joes-to-open-friday
title: Worth The Wait: Trader Joe’s To Open (In A Couple) Friday(s)
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
EDIT 10/24: Due to an editorial goof at the Tennessean, Trader Joe’s opening date has been misreported across the board. Sorry everyone! The good news is that you only have to wait one extra week until November 7 for the REAL opening. So block off your calendars now. 

We never thought the day would come, but the new Green Hills Trader Joe’s is FINALLY opening next Friday at 9am! For the early risers out there, they’ll be doing a drawing for Trader Joe’s goodie bags for everyone who lines up before 8:30. You can bet you’ll see us there, because this is one neighbor we can’t wait to meet.

H/t Jon Arnold.
